title: App
description: An installable progressive web app entry to be shown on the store

description.description: Information about what the app does

name.description: The name of the author (either name of developer or entity)

about.description: A brief introduction about the app's author

email.description: The email address to contact for app support

socialMedia.description: The social media URLs of the author

installationUrl.description: The URL to be visited when installing the app

websiteUrl.description: The URL of the website to see more information about the app

sourceUrl.description: The URL of the app's source code repository

sharingModel.description: App's licencing information and payment model category

type.description: The type of sharing model in use

licence.description: The SPDX licence identifier of the licence which the app is distributed under
